roleset.name: question a witness (as if) after the opposition

example.name: corpus example
example.text: They refuse to testify at a deposition , and my suggestion to them was that if we were capable of resolving something as a result of this conference , that they would then attend a deposition , because I believe the defendants would have a right to cross - examine them or otherwise examine them prior to them taking the stand .

propbank.arg: prior to them taking the stand

example.name: passive with topic
example.text: Kevan Walsh , ESR scientist , will be cross examined on his claim Robin Bain shot from more than 20 cm away

propbank.arg: on his claim Robin Bain shot from more than 20 cm away

example.name: passive with predicate
example.text: Last week I was cross - examined as an expert witness in a software litigation case in Utah .

propbank.arg: in a software litigation case in Utah

roleset.note: CROSSEXAMINE-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on instance in ULA. (from crossexamine.01-v)
